thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 27 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Brewin Dolphin says FD steps down, trading in line

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Brewin Dolphin says FD steps down, trading in line
text:
April 27 (Reuters) - Brewin Dolphin Holdings PLC:
* ANDREW WESTENBERGER, FINANCE DIRECTOR, WILL BE STEPPING DOWN AS A DIRECTOR ON 16 MAY 2018
* BREWIN DOLPHIN TODAY ANNOUNCES THAT ANDREW WESTENBERGER, FINANCE DIRECTOR, WILL BE STEPPING DOWN AS A DIRECTOR ON 16 MAY 2018 AND WILL BE LEAVING COMPANY BY MUTUAL AGREEMENT
* BOARD HAS COMMENCED A SEARCH FOR A PERMANENT REPLACEMENT.
* BUSINESS CONTINUES TO PERFORM IN LINE WITH EXPECTATIONS WITH CONTINUING GROWTH IN INCOME AND PROFITABILITY
* BUSINESS CONTINUES TO PERFORM IN LINE WITH EXPECTATIONS WITH CONTINUING GROWTH IN INCOME AND PROFITABILITY. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting By UK Bureau)
